sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Link from "next/link"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { Row, Col, Image, Tag, Skeleton, Space } from "antd"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import moment from "moment"; import { dummy } from "../../../utils/dummy"; import CharacterCard from "../../../components/common/CharacterCard"; import LocationCard from "../../../components/common/LocationCard"; import { getStory, getChapters, getStoryCharacters, } from "../../../redux/actions/storiesActions"; const Story = ({ getStory, story, loading, getChapters, chapters, getStoryCharacters, }) => { const router = useRouter(); // useEffect(() => { // setTimeout(() => { // setLoading(false); // }, 3000); // }, []); useEffect(() => { getStory(router.query.id); getChapters(router.query.id); getStoryCharacters(router.query.id); }, []); return (
{!loading && ( <>

{story.title}

by{" "} {story.authorName}

Summary

{story.summary ? story.summary : "No summary yet"}

Details

Posted at: {moment(story.createdAt).format("MM-DD-YYYY")}
Category:{" "} Drama
Language: {story.language}
Status: {story.status}
Copyright: {story.copyright}
Cover Copyright: {story.imageCopyright}
Mature content: {story.mature ? "YES" : "NO"}

Tags

{story.tags.map((tag) => ( {`#${tag}`} ))}
)} <> {loading && ( )}

Chapters

{!chapters.loading && chapters.items.map((item) => (

{item.number}. {item.title} -{" "} {item.commentsCount} comments

Read Edit Delete
))}

Main Characters

Secondary Characters

Locations
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ story: state.stories.story, loading: state.stories.loading, chapters: state.stories.chapters, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getStory, getChapters, getStoryCharacters, })(Story);
